rules_text:
Vigilance; Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
[i]Dutiful Supervision[/i] – Vander can't attack or block for the first, second, or third turn of the game.
[i]Alabaster Duty[/i] – Whenever Vander, Holy Veteran attacks, another target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.
